theme.user_intent: The user wants their pins to appear in Tailwind Communities as intended.
symptoms: Pins are published on Pinterest but not visible in communities
Issue has persisted for two months
All English pins assigned to communities
theme.root_cause_hypothesis: Possible synchronization issue between published pins and community visibility settings.

theme.user_intent: The user wants to see their published posts in the communities they are part of.
symptoms: Posts not appearing in the 'yours' tab
theme.root_cause_hypothesis: Possible issue with the visibility settings of the posts within the communities or a bug in the display of published content.

theme.user_intent: The user wants their scheduled pins to automatically appear in the Communities without manual intervention.
symptoms: Pins not showing up in Communities after being published on Pinterest
User has checked the 'Yours' tab with no results
Issue has persisted for around two weeks
User has to manually add each pin after posting
theme.root_cause_hypothesis: There may be a synchronization issue between the scheduled pins and the Communities feature, preventing the pins from being displayed correctly.
